jbb.engine.pacman
Class PacMan

java.lang.Object
  jbb.engine.Tile
      jbb.engine.Avatar
          jbb.engine.Hero
              jbb.engine.pacman.PacMan

public class PacMan
extends Hero

PacMan is the Hero of PacGame. He collects PacDots to gain points and win.

Author:
Jonathan Gravel
